calculateAxolotlVariant(Axolotl.Variant) - Static method in class me.efekos.simpler.items.ItemContent
Converts an Axolotl.Variant to a number Minecraft will understand.
calculateDecimalColor(Color) - Static method in class me.efekos.simpler.items.ItemContent
Converts a Color to a decimal color, a color format used for leather armors and fireworks in Minecraft.

Converts type of FireworkEffect to a number that Minecraft will understand.

Generates a number for "HideFlags" property from the flags given.
calculatePatternColor(DyeColor) - Static method in class me.efekos.simpler.items.ItemContent
Converts a DyeColor to a number for uses inside a banner pattern.
calculatePatternColor(ItemStack) - Static method in class me.efekos.simpler.items.ItemContent
Same with ItemContent.calculatePatternColor(DyeColor), but this time it does it based on Material of the item given.
calculatePotionEffect(PotionEffectType) - Static method in class me.efekos.simpler.items.ItemContent
Converts a PotionEffectType to a number Minecraft will understand.
